featured.text: Jack: I wish I were a millionaire.
Over 100,000 people with “gold fever” made this trip hoping to become millionaires.

definition.zh_def: 百萬富翁，指擁有至少一百萬貨幣單位（通常是美元）的人。
definition.en_def: A person whose wealth is equal to or exceeds one million units of currency.
definition.example: After years of hard work, she finally became a millionaire.
